episodes.title: Anti Cult Protest - London
episodes.description:
A friendly group of ex Jehovah Witnesses invite al excult members to support our protest for the rights of children.

Many religious organisations violate the rights of the children. And many politicians dont understand that freedom or religion also include the right of children to abandon their parents religion without being bullied, shunned or cohersed.

The camplain #allreligionsmust focus on the fact that all religions must respect human rights and this have already been legislated in Norway.

Since Jehovah Witnesses violates the rights of children, JW do no longer have the status as a religion. They still have the right to belive whatever they want, but they no longer get a taxbreak.  

When government give taxbreak to a religion, they are funding the organisation.  Norway finaly realised that they can not finance violations of human rights.  Now we want to make the UK government aware of the same problem.

Member of Parlament, Sam Carling, grew up as a Jehovah's Witness and have been invited to the protest.
